code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:46 yr old white f president presents with Neurological. she is having symptoms 9 x week, in spite of treatment. she is a chronic alcoholic she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 173 cm, Weight 54.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, B burgdorferi IgM CSF positive a:Paralysis p:administered Immune globulin - 400 mg/kg IV daily x 5 days, performed B burgdorferi IgM CSF, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:47 yo white F president presents with Neurological for more than 9 days. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 53.4 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

s:a 47 yo female presents with 4 months history of Neurological. she denies smoking she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 173 cm, Weight 53.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Paralysis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Immune globulin - 400 mg/kg IV daily x 5 days, and ordered Endovascular coiling - brain.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
